trait.name: Regeneration (Slaad Only)
entries: The spirit regains 5 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

trait.name: Whispering Aura (Mind Flayer Only)
entries: At the start of each of the spirit's turns, the spirit emits psionic energy if it doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition. {@actSave wis} DC equals your spell save DC, each creature (other than you) within 5 feet of the spirit. {@actSaveFail} {@damage 2d6} Psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Claw (Slaad Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Slashing damage, and the target can't regain Hit Points until the start of the spirit's next turn.

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
entries: {@atkr r} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, range 150 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Mind Flayer Only)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Psychic damage.
